channel.title: Hiring a Coder/Web Designer 10$ a month!
channel.description: I will pay 10 $ a month. You will get the admin rank You can edit anything you would like. I need 2 people each get 10$ a month. Coder and Website/Forum Design I have the base down already. I'm looking to add new commands and drops and pk zone and castle wars and much much more. Email me for questions at gkponder22@gmail.com

item.title: Hiring a Coder/Web Designer 10$ a month!
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“djdoyle1, post:5, topic:415157”]I’m a CSS, HTML & PHP coder, not a designer, I’m experienced in vBulletin, I’ll be site and forum manager. Hit me up at j.doyle133@gmail.com

EDIT; oh and here’s my CV: http://webcache.googleusercontent.com/search?q=cache:http://jordandoyle.co.in/[/quote]Haha. Just made me laugh. No experience is required for forum setups like vBulletin, SMF, ipVB etc. They are so F*ing easy to set up and for vBulletin and SMF, there are mods and stuff to install to do things for you.

Read full topic
item.source: Hiring a Coder/Web Designer 10$ a month!

item.title: Hiring a Coder/Web Designer 10$ a month!
item.dc:creator: @Joker420 Joker420
item.description:
@Joker420 wrote:

RiiPiiNFtW:

Guys you are STUPID. This is the wrong section. We do not allow people to be payed. He help people for lulz or just for the sake of helping. Obviously some newbs above my post are kinda desperate to “show off” their (leeched) coding skills. AMAZING!!!

I agree.^^
